name: Death's Lease
description:
Terrible news! Deaths rent just went up, so he must take up some extra jobs on the side to make ends meet. The richer you become, the bigger the targets! You might want to bring along some help, but remember, you'll have to split the reward with any... survivors. It'd be a shame if anything were to happen to the adventurers joining death...

Controls: numpad or top number keys 1-6

Select a character by pressing the number on its field. Choose an action by pressing the corresponding number. Choose a target by pressing the number in the target's field.

After reaping a party member, your main character heals and becomes stronger for that quest.
